evidence.claim: Hestia Advantage complies with HIPAA regulations, indicating the use of secure health data practices.
The website mentions the use of FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Hestia engages in EDI transactions which are essential for healthcare data management.
References to systems that support HL7, crucial for healthcare integrations.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of using X12 transactions or API automation on their site.
